articles.description: Beer, cannabis, and spirits come together as companies look to follow the consumer into the future.
articles.content:
There was a lot of buzz in the beer industry this week as two brands bulked up their portfolio and another slimmed down.
On Tuesday, cannabis and consumer packaged goods giant Tilray (TLRY) scooped … [+5862 chars]

articles.author: Diccon Hyatt
articles.title: Prices in China are Falling: Here's Why That's a Problem - Investopedia
articles.description: News this week that consumer prices in China fell 0.3% from the year before set off alarm bells because deflation can devastate economies.
articles.content: Imagine you go out shopping one day and notice the prices for everything were a little bit lower than the last time you went to the store. The same is true for the next store you visit, and the next,… [+2494 chars]
